meanings.definition: Form a concept or idea of (something)
meanings.sent1: She conceptualizes a new invention in her mind.
meanings.sent2: He always conceptualizes his stories before writing them down.
meanings.sent3: The artist conceptualizes a world where animals can talk.
meanings.sent4: Her mind conceptualizes a universe made of candy and rainbows.
meanings.sent5: The child conceptualizes a magical land where toys come to life.

meanings.definition: To interpret or explain in terms of a concept
meanings.sent1: The teacher conceptualizes complex theories for her students.
meanings.sent2: He conceptualizes the data to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent3: The comedian conceptualizes everyday situations in a hilarious way.
meanings.sent4: She conceptualizes the world as a giant puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The scientist conceptualizes the universe as a vast interconnected web.
